name: EMDR Europe Association
goal:
To promote EMDR (Eye Movement Desensitisation and Reprocessing) as a treatment of choice for psychological conditions, which are a result of psychological trauma or other unresolved life experiences.
To provide an international forum within Europe for establishing, teaching and discussing matters relevant to research, the development of and adherence to guidelines, and the practice of EMDR.
We have the vision Vision for EMDR therapy to be the treatment of choice for PTSD and other trauma related disorders.
interests: Education and training, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Health-related initiatives from the EU institutions, particularly the ones dealing with the treatment of PTSD and trauma disorders.
